people.title: Manage Conflict
people.deepDive: Conflict is a team performance opportunity. Resolve using situational techniques to reach a win-win consensus.
enablers: Interpret source and stage of conflict
Analyze the context for the conflict
people.veteranTip: PMI wants a win-win. 'Forcing' is only for emergencies. Check the RACI first—most technical conflict is just role confusion.

people.title: Lead a Team
people.deepDive: Adopt a servant leadership style to empower the team, remove blockers, and foster a high-performance environment.
enablers: Set a clear vision and mission
people.veteranTip: Leadership isn't about having the answers; it's about removing the blockers so your experts can work.

process.title: Execute with Urgency
process.deepDive: Deliver business value faster by identifying opportunities to fast-track or crash the schedule without compromising quality.
enablers: Assess opportunities to deliver value early
process.veteranTip: Urgency is not haste. It's about knowing your Critical Path so well you know exactly where you can afford to push.

business.title: Manage Compliance
business.deepDive: Ensure the project adheres to legal, regulatory, and safety standards to protect the organization and stakeholders.
business.veteranTip: Compliance is a non-negotiable constraint. If you miss a regulatory gate, the project is a failure regardless of the budget.

business.title: Evaluate and Deliver Benefits
business.deepDive: Verify that the project is delivering the intended business value and benefits defined in the business case.
business.veteranTip: Deliver value, not just features. If the business case changes mid-project, you must re-evaluate the entire project.

business.title: Support Org Change
business.deepDive: Manage the human side of transitions to ensure the organization is ready to adopt the project's results.
enablers: Assess impact of project on the organization
business.veteranTip: People hate change. You have to spend 50% of your time explaining the 'Why' before they will care about the 'What'.

business.title: Continuous Improvement
business.deepDive: Consistently refine project processes and methodologies based on retrospectives and lessons learned.
business.veteranTip: Never stop asking 'How can we do this better?' Every sprint should be more efficient than the last.
